name: Fell Deeds
description:
Fell Deeds

Move quickly and decide when to strike as you fight your way across seven levels. As you descend deeper into the dungeon, you'll face more dangerous foes and traps. Reach the deepest layer of the dungeon and stop the necromancer from opening a portal to hell!

  • 20–40-minute fast action platformer.
  • Save your progress at campfires and pick the game up later.
  • 7 levels featuring a variety of challenges and bosses.
  • It has a volume control!
  • Use several special abilities to help you tackle the dungeon.

Credits

Art assets by Itch creators Luiz Melo, Szadi art, and others. Music by Joel Steudler.
